description.title: This is the quintessential ballooning experience.
description.paragraph: Join a select group of fellow adventurers for a morning where strangers become friends. Unlike standard "open" baskets where guests are crowded together, Flying Pictures uses Cameron Balloons Compartmented Baskets. What does this mean for you? Even in a shared flight, you have your own protected corner of the sky. No fighting for a view, just shared awe.

steps.description: After you complete your check-in we will welcome you with our coffee station with hot beverages and traditional cookies.

steps.title: The Inflation Spectacle
steps.description: Walk to the launch field to watch the "Giants" come to life. Seeing the massive balloons rise with the roar of the burners is the first act of the show.

steps.title: The Ascent
